mapper.select: SELECT p.proj_id, p.proj_title, p.proj_reg_date, p.member_no, p.proj_apply_deadline, p.proj_start_date, p.proj_end_date, p.proj_estimate, p.PROJ_REQR_PERSON, p.PROJ_REQR_SKILL, p.PROJ_TYPE, p.PROJ_CAREER, p.PROJ_PM, p.PROJ_WORK_TYPE, p.PROJ_WORK_PLACE, p.PROJ_WORK_TIME, p.proj_work_equip, p.proj_walfare, p.proj_detail, p.PROJ_FINISH_DATE, p.apply_mem, p.proj_status, p.PROJ_UPDATE_DATE, p.PROJ_REPLYCNT, p.PROJ_TOTAL_DATE, fp.followproject_no, fp.related_member FROM (SELECT rownum rn, proj_id, proj_title, proj_reg_date, member_no, proj_apply_deadline, proj_start_date, proj_end_date, proj_estimate, PROJ_REQR_PERSON, PROJ_REQR_SKILL, PROJ_TYPE, PROJ_CAREER, PROJ_PM, PROJ_WORK_TYPE, PROJ_WORK_PLACE, PROJ_WORK_TIME, proj_work_equip, proj_walfare, proj_detail, PROJ_FINISH_DATE, apply_mem, proj_status, PROJ_UPDATE_DATE, PROJ_REPLYCNT, PROJ_TOTAL_DATE, fp.related_project, fp.related_member ) p full OUTER JOIN followproject fp on p.proj_id = fp.related_project and fp.related_member = 'member89' WHERE rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

select p.proj_id, p.proj_title, p.proj_reg_date, p.member_no, p.proj_apply_deadline, p.proj_start_date, p.proj_end_date, p.proj_estimate, p.PROJ_REQR_PERSON, p.PROJ_REQR_SKILL, p.PROJ_TYPE, p.PROJ_CAREER, p.PROJ_PM, p.PROJ_WORK_TYPE, p.PROJ_WORK_PLACE, p.PROJ_WORK_TIME, p.proj_work_equip, p.proj_walfare, p.proj_detail, p.PROJ_FINISH_DATE, p.apply_mem, p.proj_status, p.PROJ_UPDATE_DATE, p.PROJ_REPLYCNT, p.PROJ_TOTAL_DATE ,fp.followproject_no from project p full OUTER JOIN followproject fp on p.proj_id = fp.related_project and fp.related_member = #{member_no} where p.PROJ_WORK_PLACE LIKE '%'|| #{prefered_area} ||'%' OR p.PROJ_REQR_SKILL LIKE '%'|| #{skill}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO followproject VALUES ('followproject'|| followproject_seq.nextval, #{related_project}, #{related_member}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select p.* from followproject fp, project p where fp.related_member = #{related_member} and p.proj_id = fp.related_project
select * from followproject where related_member = #{related_member} and related_project = #{related_project}
mapper.update: update meet set meet_datetime = #{meet_datetime}, meet_req_mem = #{meet_req_mem}, meet_contents = #{meet_contents}, meet_type = 0 where meet_id = #{meet_id}
update project set proj_status = 2 where proj_start_date <= sysdate
